description.en: A chance creation made with sweet red bean juice. Not for everyone...

note.en: Drop rate from Simian was raised from 3% to 8% in v1.09.

prerequisites.en: Requires Reflector Ray or Dimension Shift.
Requires High Jump or better mobility abilities.

chests.note: Although you would normally use the Craftwork shard to move the Iron Maiden out of the way, it's also possible to knock the Blood Grinder Knight into it, which destroys the Iron Maiden.

description.en: A breastplate that nullifies all damage from traps and hazardous environments.
Wearable ears that resemble those of a certain sylvan race.

prerequisites.en: Use Invert into the gap in the ceiling.

quest.name: Avenge the death of my husband!

prerequisites.en: Requires High Jump or better mobility abilities.

special.en: Benjamin in Arvantville after completing all of his quests.
